data.name: AlreadyEndorsedMessage
data.value: You have already endorsed **{0}** for this award.
data.comment: Message to be shown when user is already endorsed. {0}: Nominated team members..

data.name: AdminHeaderText
data.value: Your new awards captain is...
data.comment: Header text to be shown in admin selection card.

data.name: AdminSubheaderText
data.comment: Sub header text to be shown in admin selection card. {0}: Name of the champion, {1}: Email id of champion.

data.name: ConfigureAdminTitle
data.value: Set awards captain
data.comment: Title text to show in set champion task module.

data.name: ContentText
data.value: Ready to get started? Select your awards captain
data.comment: Text to show in channel welcome card.

data.name: EndorseButtonText
data.value: Endorse
data.comment: Title text to show in Endorse card.

data.name: EndorseTitle
data.value: Endorse
data.comment: Title text to show in Endorse button.

data.name: ErrorMessage
data.value: Something went wrong. Try again in a few minutes.
data.comment: Generic error message.

data.name: InvalidTeamText
data.value: Bot cannot be used here because it has not been added for this team.
data.comment: Text to show when user tries to open bot from team where the bot is not yet configured.

data.name: ManageAwardsBulletPoint
data.value: * Allow nomination of your team mates for designated awards.
data.comment: Message to be shown in welcome card.

data.name: NominateBulletPoint
data.value: * Approve and publish the award winners from the list of nominees.
data.comment: Message to be shown in welcome card.

data.name: NominateButton
data.value: Nominate
data.comment: Text to be shown in nominate button.

data.name: NominateButtonText
data.value: Nominate now
data.comment: Text to be shown in nominate now button.

data.name: NominatedByText
data.value: Nominated by {0}.
data.comment: Text to be shown in Endorse card.

data.name: NominatePeopleTitle
data.value: Nominate people
data.comment: Text to be shown in nominate card header.

data.name: NoteForTeamText
data.value: **Note from team owner:** {0}
data.comment: Text to be shown in Admin card. {0} : Name of the team member who configured awards champion for team.

data.name: OkButtonText
data.value: Ok
data.comment: Ok button text.

data.name: RewardCycleText
data.value: Reward cycle:
data.comment: Text to show reward cycle date range in tab.

data.name: RewardTitle
data.value: It's reward time!
data.comment: Header text to be shown in Reward adaptive card.

data.name: SetAdminBulletPoint
data.value: * Set awards captain who can define awards and manage reward nomination cycles.
data.comment: Message to be shown in welcome card.

data.name: SetAdminButtonText
data.value: Set awards captain
data.comment: Title text to show in set admin card.

data.name: SetRewardCycleBulletPoint
data.value: * Show support for nominees by endorsing their nominations.
data.comment: Message to be shown in welcome card.

data.name: SuccessfulEndorseMessage
data.value: You've successfully endorsed the nomination of **{0}** for the **{1}**. Results will be shared on **{2}.**
data.comment: Text to be shown in Endorse successful message. {0}: Nominees for that award. {1}: Award name. {2} reward cycle end date.

data.name: WelcomeCardTitle
data.value: Welcome!
data.comment: Text to show in welcome card.

data.name: WelcomeSubHeaderText
data.value: Here are some of the things that I can help you do:
data.comment: Text to show as a sub header in welcome card.

data.name: WelcomeTeamCardContent
data.value: Hello, I am Workplace Awards bot and I can help you nominate your team members for performance awards.
data.comment: Text to show bot description in welcome card.

data.name: AwardWinnerCardTitle
data.value: And the winners areâ€¦
data.comment: Text to show in Winner Carousel card.

data.name: WinnerCardRewardCycleTitle
data.value: For the reward cycle
data.comment: Text to be shown in Winner carousel card.

data.name: RewardCycleHeader
data.value: Reward cycle has been configured from **{0}** to **{1}**.
data.comment: Text to be shown in Nomination Carousel card after setting reward cycle. {0}: award cycle start date, {1}: award cycle end date.

data.name: CycleValidationMessage
data.value: We're not currently in an active award cycle. Wait until the next cycle to nominate or endorse a teammate.
data.comment: Validation message to be shown if user tries to nominate or endorse without active reward cycle.

data.name: SetAdminMentionText
data.value: As awards captain, {0} will define the awards, set the awards cycle, and share the results. Thanks so much! - {1}.
data.comment: Mention text when new admin is configured. {0} awards captain name. {1} Name of the team member who configured awards champion for team.

data.name: UnsupportedBotCommand
data.value: I don't know that command. Try typing command: -Nominate
data.comment: Message to be shown in channel when user types any unsupported bot command.

data.name: AdminTabNavigationText
data.value: Visit Workplace Awards tab to setup and manage reward cycles.
data.comment: Action button title text to navigate user to Tab.

data.name: CycleClosedMessage
data.value: This reward cycle is closed.
data.comment: Validation message to be shown if user tries to nominate or endorse without active reward cycle or after publishing the winners for that cycle

data.name: NominationMentionText
data.value: {0} has been nominated for this award. Feel free to endorse them! Thanks so much! - {1} .
data.comment: Mention text when new nomination submited. {0} Nominees for that award, {1} Nominator.

data.name: WinnerMentionText
data.value: Congratulations
data.comment: Mention text when new winner published.

data.name: NominationReminderNotificationText
data.value: Nominations are about to close, please nominate now.
data.comment: Text to show in nomination reminder notification card.

data.name: ViewWinnerTabText
data.value: **View published results on Workplace Awards tab.**
data.comment: Text to show in winner card to navigate user to tab.

data.name: WelcomeCardNewAdminText
data.value: **The existing awards captain has left the team. Please choose a new awards captain to proceed.**
data.comment: Welcome card text when existing admin left the team.

data.name: InvalidTenantText
data.value: Unexpected tenant id found.
data.comment: Unexpected tenant id found.

data.name: MessagingExtensionErrorMessage
data.value: This app not available in 1:1 or group chats. To send an award, navigate to a team where Workplace Awards has been added.
data.comment: Message to be shown when bot invoked from 1:1 or group chat
